event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected component, the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The number of correctable errors associated with this processor has exceeded acceptable levels or an uncorrectable error was detected on this processor.
event_registry_properties.name: details
impact
event_registry_properties.item: System performance may be affected. If the fault resulted from an excess of correctable errors, there will have been no operational impact on system or application activity. If the fault resulted from an uncorrectable error, a process may have been suspended or the system may have rebooted.
event_registry_properties.name: po-action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected CPU, the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>.
event_registry_properties.name: po-description
event_registry_properties.item: The number of errors associated with this CPU has exceeded acceptable levels.
event_registry_properties.name: po-impact
po-response
response
event_registry_properties.item: None. The diagnosis determined that the affected resource cannot be removed from service.
event_registry_properties.name: title
